content: **set of knitted jumper with stripes dots and raglan pants and socks for baby and children in drops fabel** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ matching b19-27 hello stripes socks /patterns/library/b19-27-hello-stripes-socks ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ * jumper **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years finished measurements bust 50-56-62 68-74 cm / 19¾ -22 -24⅜ 26¾ -29⅛ full length 28-30-34 38-42 cm / 11 -11¾ -13⅜ 15 -16½ **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio 100-100-100 100-100 g color no 910 sea mist 50-50-50 100-100 g color no 100 off-white drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 cm / 24 size 2 5 mm / us 1 or 2 or size needed to get correct gauge drops wooden button no 513 4 pcs * pants **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years finished measurements waist 48-50-54 56-58 cm / 19 -19¾ -21¼ 22 -22¾ full length 36-42-46 52-59 cm / 14¼ -16½ -18 20½ -23¼ **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes color no 100 off-white 50 g for all sizes color no 910 sea mist drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 2 5 mm / us 1 or 2 or size needed to get correct gauge elastic approx 60 cm / 24
